conbody.note: By default the student module window will be minimized into the system tray after the launch.
conbody.p: This mode allows the teacher to remotely restore student module window from the system tray and raise it on top of all other windows on the desktop. This action can be performed for the whole class, a group, or for the individual student workstations.
Select Raise from the student menu (see ) to raise the window on a particular workstation.
Press Remote control button in the group tab menu (see ) and select Raise to raise student module windows on all workstations in the group.
Press Remote control button in the class tab menu (see ) and select Raise to raise student module windows on all workstations in the class.
